name: Mounts & More
description: Mounts, mastery skills and novelty icons in radial, icon rows and corner icons. Settings need to be configured before using the module!

changelog.1.4.8: 2023-12-05: Added an option to the contextual radial context so users who don't want to configure the dismount key can use any mount they want in IsPlayerMounted. For more info, please check the documentation.
changelog.1.4.7: 2023-11-30: Fix flying detection flickering regardless of fps.
changelog.1.4.6: 2023-11-28: Set mouse position relative to game window.
changelog.1.4.5: 2023-11-27: Fix prevent user defined radial settings keybinds also triggering contextual radial settings + add icons by rodentmastermind
changelog.1.4.3: 2023-11-17: Added transparent mastery and novelty icons provided by dingus179
changelog.1.4.2: 2023-11-15: Changed flying thresholds + fixed a crash + fixed mouse input being captured by icons when not enabled + clarified radial misconfiguration + added validation for overlapping keybinds in settings + switch IsPlayerGlidingOrFalling and IsPlayerUnderWater order + prevented user-defined keybinds to stay activated after deletion
changelog.1.4.1: 2023-11-05: Put all mounts in by default (new users). + Display default settings in the settings screens by default. + Prevent still activating previously queued mount when already mounted skyscale in combat via combat mastery.
changelog.1.4.0-beta22: 2023-11-01: Add user-defined radial settings + add in combat radial context
changelog.1.4.0-beta17: 2023-10-09: Add all other items + make settings backwards compatible
